description:
A groovy pirate belts out a tune that leaves Kizaru in pieces, but the admiral pulls himself together in time for a crushing Light Speed Kick. Luffy and Sanji try to protect the injured Zoro from a warlord lookalike.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attouteki! Kaigun no Sentou Heiki Pacifista
Overwhelming! The Navy`s Fighting Weapons, the Pacifistas
Une puissance écrasante ! Les Pacifista, les machines de guerre de la Marine
圧倒的! 海軍の戦闘兵器パシフィスタ
